name: wino
text: A comment left by wino was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by hellofyellin, riotdejaneiro, Catachresis, mercuri0us, dennycrane, antecen, Howard, atticusonline, mystkmanat, shortside40, nutmeg, Mastronaut, Dallovich)

name: internnumber1
text: Beef's mom only buys her meth from the classiest of establishments. You will not find her buying meth from the greeter at Walmart.

name: saint
text: ...nor from the vending machines in the shady corners of the dumpy downtown strip mall.

name: erutangis
text: . . . nor from hot dumbasses with card tables in any retail entryway.

name: greenkoolayd
text: they have meth vending machines?  wtf?!

name: soticoto
text:
I take it you've never been to Japan.
The answer to any "they have ____ vending machines?" question is always "yes".

name: jsavinc
text: Soticoto, we are going through the archives in a most parallel fashion. Except that I lurk, whilst you leave a trail of "5 hours ago" comments. Fascinating!

name: soticoto
text:
And so Schroedinger's cat breaks the quantum uncertainty by coming out of lurk long enough to inform us of said lurking.


In any case, yes, I have been rampantly rampaging through the archives over the past few days... likely even more noisily than the first time or two put together, compensating for the year or two where I was unable to post more than one comment a day.
Coincidentally, the last strip I got up to today was most likely the one responsible for that limitation being put in place.

name: bazookaradio
text: A comment left by bazookaradio was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ted0phile, ShemmJacc, ButterMoths, GeyserShitdick, chivalress, StagnantDisplay, FirePowa8, trisha, aquamuffin, mystkmanat, empy, afvbs)

name: cousinted
text: A comment left by cousinted was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by shadowlink97, nutmeg, Satyr)

name: spinynorman
text: Yeah... But to be honest, the capital P for Punishment makes the similarities between Beef and Nice Pete even stronger. Beef's Mom Mom might not have had a weepin' eye, and his dad may have just died on the living room floor of their econo apartment instead of making Beef shoot the dog or killing him after getting pubics, but the two are definitely kindred spirits of the weirdest sort.

name: lizjones
text: Ray's apology is a sign of things to come.

name: drycup
text: Incompetent male apologies set in at an early age.

name: stuart
text: Here's a six hundo.

name: chaesar
text: 7-11? Meth from Neiman Marcus' piano player? That is what I call circumstances.

name: centipede_damascus
text:
Does 7-11 even have a phone to call? Why would anyone call there?

"Hello, I just wanted to see if you had cigarettes in stock. You do? Good. Can you hold them for me?"

name: mortshire
text: you got slim jims?  is your microwave working?

name: philosophe
text: Yes. And no.

name: mr_pete
text: Hella circumstances.

name: nutmeg
text: Amen.

name: cdl146
text: When did Beef stop wearing glasses? And pants?

name: stuart
text: And hair?

name: canusdivinus
text: Wearin' pants at their age is like wearin' three Swatches and poppin' a boner at your grandma's house.

name: carlyle
text: Not good?

name: tttt
text: I initially assumed Ray was using 7-11 to show how extremely reluctant his mom is to use the phone, and I was wondering why 7-11 of all places

name: nutmeg
text: A comment left by nutmeg was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by divot, tttt2, rascaldom)

name: stuart
text: It's because Beef's mom works there.

name: rowboat
text: A comment left by rowboat was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by madnes, Doc_Rostov, ovenface)

name: bovine
text: he's saying that the store hires a piano player to play inside of it. this isn't so uncommon to do in high end department stores.

name: rowboat
text: A genuine "thank you" for clearing that up for me. That having been said, I kind of wish I was right.

name: heccibiggs
text: Ohhh that is a well funny way of thinking of it.

name: fallow_fields
text: BTO ain't got no piano player! Just some guitars, a lumberjack and a milk jug

you're thinking of Jackyl maybe...

text: Meth dealing piano player: One of the greatest off screen characters in anything, ever.

text: Ray wears his sunglasses at night.

name: thebeans
text: One time I watched Robocop with my friends and I was sure someone was going to call my mom and tell her I saw  the titties.

name: rowboat
text: Wow. I'm a little disappointed in myself that I don't remember any titties in Robocop.
